akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than one year after February 24, 2016, and every 2 years thereafter, the Commissioner and the Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement shall jointly develop and submit to the appropriate congressional committees a joint strategic plan.
(b) Contents The joint strategic plan required under this section shall be comprised of a comprehensive multiyear plan for trade enforcement and trade facilitation, and shall include—
(d) Form of plan The joint strategic plan required under this section shall be submitted in unclassified form, but may include a classified annex.
